name: Malice in Muirfieland
tagline: A text adventure written in python for school
body:
### Welcome to Malice in Muirfieland!
Click Download as Zip to download the game. Check the included User Guide for instructions on how to install the game, as well as how to run and play the game! Have fun!

### Installation
To play the game, you need to have a modern version of python installed, this can be downloaded from 

[https://www.python.org/downloads/](https://www.python.org/downloads/)

You can install either python 2 or python 3, the game will work with both versions. Follow the instructions on their site for installing python.  

If you haven’t downloaded the game yet, you can get it from

[https://github.com/Mikumiku747/Malice-in-Muirfieland/zipball/master](https://github.com/Mikumiku747/Malice-in-Muirfieland/zipball/master)

Press the download ZIP button on the side of the page to download all the game files as a .zip file. 

Once you have the game downloaded, extract the file to a folder in My documents. This can be done by going to the downloads folder and right-clicking on the file, then pressing “Extract all…”, and then pressing browse, and choosing “My documents”, then pressing “New folder” and calling it “Malice in Muirfieland”.

Alternatively, if you have GitHub Desktop installed, you can go to the project page ([https://github.com/Mikumiku747/Malice-in-Muirfieland/](https://github.com/Mikumiku747/Malice-in-Muirfieland/)) and 
press the Clone in desktop button to have the game install and update automatically. 


If you'd like to contribute to the project, press the View on GitHub button to head over to our GitHub page, where you can report bugs and make suggestions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
